       fv.`uniform_catalog_code` COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci as `code`,                 -- 数据资源编码code，'逻辑视图编码',utf8mb4_general_ci

       fv.`business_name` COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci        as `name`,                 -- '数据资源名称',utf8mb4_general_ci
       fv.`description` COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci          as `description`,          -- 数据资源描述，'逻辑视图描述',utf8mb4_general_ci
       3                                                    as `asset_type`,         -- 资产类型 2 接口服务 3 逻辑视图 4 指标
       'rgba(89,163,255,1)'                                 as `color`,                -- 颜色
       round(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(fv.`publish_at`))               as `published_at`,       -- datetime，'发布时间',UNIX_TIMESTAMP（）转为bigint型，单位为秒的时间戳，
       round(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(fv.`online_time`))             as `online_at`,
       -- datetime，UNIX_TIMESTAMP（）转为bigint型，单位为秒的时间戳，上线时间，2.0.0.5版本新增了上线时间
       case when fv.`publish_at` >= 0 then 'published'
           else   'unpublished'
           end as `publish_status`,
       fv.`online_status`                                    as  `online_status` ,
       -- 2.0.0.5版新增 上线状态，默认：未上线 notline，  全部状态枚举：未上线 notline、已上线 online、已下线offline、上线审核中up-auditing、下线审核中down-auditing、上线审核未通过up-reject、下线审核未通过down-reject
       -- 以下三种状态属于已上线：已上线 online、下线审核中down-auditing、下线审核未通过down-reject
       -- 搜索列表增加筛选项：需要支持以接口服务发布状态去筛选，包括全部、未发布、已发布；未发布包含未发布、发布审核中、发布审核未通过，已发布包含已发布、变更审核中、变更审核未通过
       case when fv.`publish_at` >= 0 then 'published_category'
           else   'unpublished_category' end as publish_status_category,

       usr.`name` COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci                  as `owner_name`,         -- 数据owner姓名, utf8mb4_general_ci
       fv.`department_id` COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci        as `department_id`,        -- 部门id, utf8mb4_general_ci
       dpt.`name` COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci                  as `department_name`,      -- 部门名称, utf8mb4_general_ci
       dpt.`path_id` COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci               as `department_path_id`, -- 部门层级路径id，utf8mb4_general_ci
       dpt.`path` COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci                as `department_path`,    -- 部门层级路径，utf8mb4_general_ci
       fv.`subject_id` COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci             as `subject_id`,           -- '主题id',包括L1和L2，utf8mb4_general_ci
       sbj.`name`                                             as `subject_name`,         -- 主题名称。utf8mb4_unicode_ci
       sbj.`path_id`                                          as `subject_path_id`,      -- 主题层级路径id，utf8mb4_unicode_ci
       sbj.`path`                                           as `subject_path`          -- 主题层级路径，utf8mb4_unicode_ci
from af_main.form_view fv
         left join af_configuration.`user` usr
                   on fv.owner_id = usr.id
         left join (SELECT `id`,
                           name,
                           path_id,
                           `path`
                    FROM af_configuration.`object`
                    where type in (1, 2)
                      and deleted_at = 0) dpt
                   on fv.department_id = dpt.id
         left join (SELECT id,
                           name,
                           description,
                           owners,
                           'L1' as `prefix_name`,
                           path_id,
                           `path`
                    FROM af_main.subject_domain g
                    where g.`type` in (1, 2)
                      and deleted_at = 0) sbj
                   on fv.subject_id COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci = sbj.id
where (fv.deleted_at is null or fv.deleted_at = 0)
